thought.text: Perfect! So the rename_column test should also expect the "missing column" error, not the ordering error. Let me update that test too:

action.old_str:
with pytest.raises(ValueError) as exc:
        ts.copy().rename_column('time', 'banana')
    assert exc.value.args[0] == ("TimeSeries object is invalid - expected "
                                 "'time' as the first column but found 'banana'")
action.new_str:
with pytest.raises(ValueError) as exc:
        ts.copy().rename_column('time', 'banana')
    assert exc.value.args[0] == ("TimeSeries object is invalid - required "
                                 "column 'time' is missing")
